original_text:
Would he contend with me in the greatness of his power?
    No; he would pay attention to me.
korean_text: 그가 큰 권능을 가지시고 나와 더불어 다투시겠느냐 아니로다 도리어 내 말을 들으시리라

sentences.original_text: Would he contend with me in the greatness of his power?
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그의 권능의 위대함으로 나와 변론하겠는가?

sentences.original_text: he would pay attention to me.
